TopicTitle: Does 0.21.1 is worth downloading or wait for another update

Articles.Content:
I've heard here on the forum a lot of complaints, so it's good?

Does i can download it via patcher or download from store?

the price only goes up

i got mine for $9.9 or $15 when it was v0.12 ... i forgot

it's $24 now

I've heard here on the forum a lot of complaints, so it's good?

Does i can download it via patcher or download from store?

Most of the complaints was related to SAS issue in .21.0 which has now been more or less fixed it seems.
the only issue ive had with it is that my jaw hurts from hitting the floor a few times and ive eaten some flies cuz i cant seem to keep it off of there

The SAS is not working at all like the last version; it has issues with even slightly unbalanced rockets but is absolutely fantastic for airplanes, so keep that in mind.

Other than that this update has been stellar. New parts, visuals, and back-end work. I recommend getting it.

Nah, not worth it. Pass. Also the forums aren't good, you should stop posting too.

lol
You should get it because you would have to wait about 3 months for a newer version.
Pretty much every part of this update has been good. However if you were heavily reliant on the heading lock of the previous ASAS then you may struggle to adjust.
